extension.description: This script offers various possibilities to display online content inside skins as well as a complete MovieDB browser including info dialogs for various media types. Used services are themoviedb.org, theaudiodb.org, Trakt.TV, omdbapi.com and a lot more. Needs skin implementation for lot of functions.
